Header.title: Qiskit Fall Fest 2024
Header.paragraph: IBM In Partnership with the GDG OAU Quantum Computing Club At Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife

About.paragraph: This event is designed to bring together enthusiasts and beginners in quantum computing and tech innovation. Whether you're interested in learning the basics of Qiskit, participating in coding challenges, or hearing from industry experts, this challenge has something for everyone. With a hackathon, workshops, expert talks, and networking opportunities, youâ€™ll dive deep into cutting-edge technology while building valuable connections. Don't miss this opportunity to expand your skills and explore the future of quantum computing! Join us for the 24-day learning challenge (October 18 - November 10, 2024), featuring a dynamic mix of activities around quantum computing and tech innovation.
Why: Gain insights from industry experts, including a speakers from Yale University.
Participate in coding challenges for all levels and a short-timed quiz competition.
Experience rich networking opportunities, alongside with other participants.
Why2: Win amazing swags and gifts, e.g. IBM vests, jotters, etc.

Speakers.name: Pranet Sharma
Speakers.text: Quantum  Engineering Researcher at Yale University

Contact.address: Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, Osun State, Nigeria

Features.title: 24-day Learning Challenge Kickoff
Features.text: Join us for the 24-day learning challenge (October 18 - November 10, 2024), featuring a dynamic mix of activities around quantum computing and tech innovation.

Features.title: Beginner-level Hackathon
Features.text: Beginner-friendly hackathon beginning on November 14 to November 19, with projects due three days before the event. Winners will be announced on the final day, with certificates and prizes.

Features.title: Short-timed Quiz Competition
Features.text: Test your skills with coding challenges for all levels and a short-timed quiz competition.

Features.title: Hands-on Session
Features.text: Gain a practical experience on quantum computing using IBM Qiskit. You have access to auto-graded challenge notebooks and open-ended beginner level notebooks.

Features.title: IBM and Club Leads Talks
Features.text: Hear from industry experts, including speakers from Yale University, the Quantum Computing Lead, and the GDG on Campus Lead.

Schedules.title: Online Examination for Learning Challenge Participants
